meanings.definition: An enzyme that catalyzes the hydrolysis of arginine to ornithine and urea.
meanings.sent1: Arginases are important enzymes in the body that help break down arginine into ornithine and urea.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the arginases in the lab to understand their role in metabolism.
meanings.sent3: The arginases at the party were busy breaking down arginine molecules instead of dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the relentless action of arginases breaking down arginine.
meanings.sent5: The arginases worked tirelessly, like tiny machines, to convert arginine into ornithine and urea.
